00089 public function setNoOfDesiredMessagesPerPage($no_of_desired_messages_per_page)
00090 {
00091     if ($no_of_desired_messages_per_page >=1 && $no_of_desired_messages_per_page <=50)
00092         {
00093     $this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page = $no_of_desired_messages_per_page;
00094         }
00095 }

00261   private function getNumberofSearchedReplies($searchValue)
00262   {
00263    return $this->no_of_elements = $this->objAllReplies->getNoOfSearchedReplies($this->title,$searchValue);
00264   }
00265   public function searchReplies($search_value)
00266 {
00267   return $this->AllReplies =  $this->objAllReplies->searchReplies($this->title,$search_value,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00268 }
00269 public function sortReplies($type_of_sort)
00270 {
00271 
00272 switch ($type_of_sort)
00273         {
00274 
00275             case 'sortAuthorsAscendingOrder': return $this->AllReplies =  $this->objAllReplies->sortByAuthorAtoZ($this->title,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00276             break;
00277             case 'sortAuthorsDescendingOrder': return $this->AllReplies =  $this->objAllReplies->sortByAuthorZtoA($this->title,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00278             break;
00279             case 'sortByLatestModifiedMessages': return $this->AllReplies = $this->objAllReplies->sortByLatestModified($this->title,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00280             break;
00281 //            case 'sortByOldestModifiedMessages': return $this->AllReplies = $this->objAllReplies->sortByLatestModified($this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00282 //            break;
00283             case 'sortByOldestModifiedMessages': return $this->AllReplies =  $this->objAllReplies->sortByOldestModified($this->title, $this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00284             break;
00285             default:
00286                 return $this->AllReplies = $this->objAllReplies->sortByLatestModified($this->title,$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page,$this->page_number_array[$this->page_number]*$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page);
00287             break;
00288                // $this->clickedAdd=$this->getParam('clickedadd');
00289 
00290                 //return "home_tpl.php";
00291         }
00292 }
00293 private function getNumberofReplies()
00294 {
00295    foreach($this->AllReplies as $thisComment)
00296            {
00297     $id = $thisComment["id"];
00298    $userid = $thisComment["userid"];
00299    $replytitle = $thisComment["title"];
00300    $commenttxt = $thisComment["commenttxt"];
00301    $modified = $thisComment["modified"];
00302    $unreplied = $thisComment["unreplied"];
00303    $no_of_replies = $thisComment["replies"];
00304 if (($this->title == $replytitle) && ($no_of_replies < 1) && ($unreplied == FALSE))
00305     {
00306 $this->no_of_elements++;
00307 
00308 
00309     }
00310   }
00311   return $this->no_of_elements;
00312 }
00313 private function getPaginationParameters()
00314 {
00315   $this->AllReplies = $this->objAllReplies->listAll();
00316         $searchBoolean = $this->getParam('searchBoolean');
00317         if ($searchBoolean==TRUE)
00318       {
00319 $searchValue = $this->getParam('searchValue');
00320 $this->no_of_elements = $this->getNumberofSearchedReplies($searchValue);
00321   }
00322   else
00323   {
00324 
00325 
00326     $this->no_of_elements = $this->getNumberofReplies();
00327   }
00328 //  $this->no_of_elements = $this->getNumberofReplies();
00329 $this->last_page_boolean_value = $this->no_of_elements%$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page;
00330 $this->number_of_pages = $this->no_of_elements/$this->no_of_desired_messages_per_page;
00331 //$this->number_of_pages = ceil($this->number_of_pages);
00332      $this->page_number_array = array();
00333 // $this->page_number_array[]= $this->number_of_pages;
00334      for ($x=0;$x<=$this->number_of_pages;$x++)
00335      {
00336 if ($x == $this->number_of_pages || ($x==0 & $this->number_of_pages== 0))
00337     {
00338     if ($this->last_page_boolean_value > 0)
00339         {
00340     $this->page_number_array[]= $x;
00341     break;
00342         }
00343     break;
00344     }
00345 
00346     else
00347         {
00348      $this->page_number_array[]=$x;
00349         }
00350      }
00351 
00352 }

00500 foreach($this->AllReplies as $thisComment){
00501    //Store the values of the array in variables
00502    $id = $thisComment["id"];
00503    $userid = $thisComment["userid"];
00504    $replytitle = $thisComment["title"];
00505    $commenttxt = $thisComment["commenttxt"];
00506    $modified = $thisComment["modified"];
00507    $unreplied = $thisComment["unreplied"];
00508    $no_of_replies = $thisComment["replies"];
00509 
00510 
00511    //Edit Row
00512 if (($this->title == $replytitle) && ($no_of_replies < 1) && ($unreplied == FALSE))
00513         {
00514     $iconEdSelect = $this->objIcon->setIconType('edit');
00515   $iconEdSelect = $this->objIcon->setAltTextForIcon($this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_editcomment"));
00516  
00517     $mngedlink = $this->objLink->createNewObjectFromModule($this->uri(array(
00518     'module'=>'hosportal',
00519     'action'=>'editreply',
00520     'id' => $id
00521    )));
00522 
00523          if ($this->objUser->getUserFullName() == $userid)
00524            {
00525    $mngedlink = $this->objLink->embedLinkToObject($iconEdSelect = $this->objIcon->showIcon()) ;
00526  
00527            }
00528    $linkEdManage = $mngedlink = $this->objLink->showLink();
00529     //Get the icon object
00530    //Set the icon name
00531    $iconDelete = $this->objIcon->setIconType('delete');
00532 
00533 $iconDelete = $this->objIcon->setAltTextForIcon($this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_delete"));
00534 
00535 
00536  $iconDelete = $this->objIcon->setIconAlignment(false);
00537  
00538    $objConfirm = &$this->objConfirm->createNewObjectFromModule('confirm', 'utilities');
00539 
00540          if ($this->objUser->getUserFullName() == $userid)
00541            {
00542    $objConfirm = $this->objConfirm->setConfirmOptions($iconDelete = $this->objIcon->showIcon() , $this->uri(array(
00543     'module' => 'hosportal',
00544     'action' => 'deletereply',
00545     'id' => $id,
00546     'idSubjectMatter' =>$this->id
00547     )) , $this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_suredelete"));
00548            }
00549 
00550    // Add the table rows.
00551    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->beginTableRow();
00552    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($userid);
00553   
00554    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($commenttxt);
00555    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($linkEdManage);
00556 
00557    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject( $objConfirm = $this->objConfirm->showConfirmMessage());
00558 
00559 
00560    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($modified);
00561       $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($this->no_of_elements);
00562  //           $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject($this->);
00563 $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->addCellwithObject(print_r($this->page_number_array));
00564    $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->endTableRow();
00565 
00566 
00567   }
00568 }
00569   
00570   $this->objForm= $this->objbuildform->addObjectToForm( $this->messagesTable = $this->objHTMLTable->showBuiltTable());
00571 
00572         return $this->objform = $this->objbuildform->showBuiltForm();
